plants.name: Spiral Aloe
plants.about: A stunning succulent garden specimen with a rosette of fleshy, spiny, gray-green leaves that forms a fascinating clockwise or counterclockwise geometric spiral pattern as the plant ages.

plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.about: The aloe vera plant is an easy, attractive succulent that makes for a great indoor companion. Aloe vera plants are useful, too, as the juice from their leaves can be used to relieve pain from scrapes and burns when applied topically.

plants.name: Hedgehog Aloe
plants.about: The Hedgehog Aloe is the plant you want to go with. Known for its soothing gel inside its leaves, it is also a lenient plant that can tolerate neglect and is easy to care for. Its green-blue leaves produce blooms that are coral-red in the spring to late summer.

plants.name: Tiger Tooth Aloe
plants.about: Tiger Tooth Aloe is a beautiful Aloe with white spots. The spiked leaves stack and form a rosette. When happily stressed, green leaves turn reddish-brown.
